mn10.en.title: Establishing of Mindfulness
mn10.en.description: In this teaching, the Buddha shares on establishing the four foundations of mindfulness - body, feelings, mind, and mental qualities. There are six choices for establishing mindfulness of body. There are five different types of mental qualities to be mindful of.
